channel.title: [z508] Private Messaging - Still need help
channel.description:
I need some help getting the send Private Message option back on my server, I have tried to look for a way to fix it numerous times but I can never find any guides on it.
This is what it looks like: [URL=http://img163.imageshack.us/i/49460353.png/][IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/8200/49460353.th.png[/img][/URL]
If you click the Players nick it opens up the Quick Message.
If you could even point me into what files it is I could probably find it then.. It is a z508 Codeusa Base
Thanks, for any help
P.S. Do not tell me to use the search option I have.. and never can find it for a 508+..
Also If you need any files just ask and ill paste them.
